body:
Our keyboard event handlers need to be on document. Our KeyboardManager
object has methods that can turn them off for particular elements like you
need.

On Thu, May 8, 2014 at 4:51 PM, Juergen Hasch notifications@github.comwrote:

> Hotkeys should only be handled in notebook cells, not in the menu or the
> toolbar.
> 
> My use case: I want to add a text input field in the toolbar. It is
> impossible to type in anything there, due to the keys being interpreted as
